channel.title: Server greeting
channel.description:
I really cant figure out how to change my server greeting.. Iv been looking for where it even deals with it in all the files but cant find where its at.. someone post where i can find it to change it or a quick way to change it please?
Also im wondering how can i spawn stuff in my own server.. ::pickup ? or do i have to make a command?

item.title: Server greeting
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

[quote=“I CREEATE, post:3, topic:9846”]::pickup (then the item code) (most of the times you will have to put a 0
in front of the code.

(4 numberd code ) might need a 0 in front. Example.
Regular Code: 1419
Code needed: 01419

3 Numberd Code:773
Code needed: 00773

After you type pick up and the code
press space then type in 9999 for what ever ammount you want

Sometimes if you look for a item it might say 2 codes for it
The first code is for the item to be Un-Noted
The second code is the item Noted

you can do the Noted code then space then do (max 999m) 9999 and you will get 9999 of that noted item

I do not know how to change the server greating. Because when i downloaded the java thing
but my compiler says i still do not have it downloaded so… yeah

well, i hope this helps bro. have a good one :D[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 17, 2008, 05:40:46 pm[/size][hr]i think it works the same with NPC’s (the computer players)
but to make them say something or be a store
you will have to look at a tut[/quote]

Hmm, only use the extra 0 if your source is programmed for that, if its not then you either only need a 0 for a 5 digit ID or you don’t need 0 at all.

To change the “greeting” just search whatever it currently is in client.java.
It would be something like:

sendMessage("Your current greeting here");

Change ONLY whats inside the quotations.

Read full topic

you will have to look at a tut

item.title: Server greeting
item.dc:creator: @_devil_666 (devil)666
item.description:
@_devil_666 wrote:

ok, to change your message open your client.java and search for “Welcome to…” and then to do the command search for “pickup” and if its there check the end of the code to see if it has “&& playerRites …” remove that and now every one can spawn items.

Read full topic
